title: In The Blink of an Eye
description: Moving to San Diego, 18- year-old Lily never imagined how her life would change. She finds secrets, lies, and betrayal hard life lessons to learn; but being in love with a man who proves to be the opposite of what she thought, turns out to be the hardest lesson of all. How will she ever recover, after being deceived by the one she entrusted her heart to? This isnâ€™t your average love story; it hits every emotion you thought you never had.
author: S.J. Batsford
